list.expr: group by (container, alertname) (ALERTS{namespace="$namespace", container=~".+", tier="", alertstate="firing"})
list.name: Alerts

targets.expr: sum (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) or vector(0)
sum (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SUCCESS"}[$period])) or vector(0)
sum (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[$period])) or vector(0)
sum (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[$period])) or vector(0)
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", container="$container", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period]))

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", container="$container", exception="none", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) / sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", container="$container", exception="none", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period]))

panels.description: Actually, query works with 'outcome' attribute: [SUCCESS, CLIENT_ERROR, SERVER_ERROR]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SUCCESS"}[$period])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) by (container))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[$period])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) by (container))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[$period])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) by (container))

panels.title: Response Status Groups 2xx / 4xx / 5xx [$period]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) by (container))
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period]))
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period]))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome!="SUCCESS"}[$period])) by (method, uri) / (sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[$period])) by (method, uri) > 0)
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$container", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", exception!="none"}[$__range]) > 0) by (method, uri))
